name: Emergency Hero free
description:
For children aged six and over !

Be a policeman!
Be a fireman!
Be a paramedic and get patients to the hospital in the Ambulance!
Rescue people with the awesome Rescue Helicopter!

With simple controls for children, Emergency Hero lets you play with four different departments of Emergency Rescue!

-Police Dept.
-Fire Dept.
-Helicopter Rescue Dept.
-Ambulance Dept.

Chase robbers in exciting police car chases through the city!
Put out burning buildings and put out fires with the firemen!
Rescue folks with the amazing rescue helicopter!
Rush patients to the hospital as the paramedic ambulance driver!

Super fun for kids!
